item.description: We are looking into going to an exhibit at Johnson & Wales. Then park the car )we should car pool) and go to dinner. A resraurant that takes reservations is about $20 an entre. I can give you that info. but, we decided to wing it for something less expensive. Hopefully Lux Burgers near Water Fire. We ned to be flexible on this one.
item.name: Spend the Day in Providence, RI - Have Dinner & Go to Water Fire
